abstract: As Visa prepares its $19 billion initial public offering for next week, Washington is mulling a move that could put a significant dent in the rosy outlook of the offering, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: As Visa prepares its $19 billion initial public offering for next week, Washington is mulling a move that could put a significant dent in the rosy outlook of the offering, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: House Bill Could Cast a Cloud Over Visa I.P.O.
